channel.title: Features on Gluten
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Gluten

item.title: Cloud Native
item.description: Specification First. Bring your OpenAPI Spec, Gluten does the rest!

item.title: Cloud Native
item.description: Cloud Native. Configure through environment variables Integrate with cloud services such as AWS Lambda.
Free as in Freedom. In addition to being free (as in “free beer”), Gluten is free (as in “freedom”). To ensure that it stays that way, it is licensed under the Affero General Public License.

item.title: Integrations
item.description: Backends. Lots of them! Route API Endpoints to Lambda functions or serve binaries from an S3 bucket.
